trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control in a visual designer.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner"></xref> class.

The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ScriptManagerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

Returns ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that represents the profile service properties defined in a Web page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control associated with the Web Page.
The collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls associated with the Web page.
The JavaScript code that defines the profile service properties.
scriptManager is .
Returns the HTML markup that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control at design time.
Override this method to change the generated HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control at design time.
The markup that is used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> at design time.
Provides a proxy script from a derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control on the page.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> control that is used to register a Web service for use in the page.
The proxy script.
Provides a proxy URL from a derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control on the page.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> control that is used to register a Web service for use in the page.
A proxy URL.
Returns ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is defined by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref> attribute.
The assembly that contains the resource.
The fully qualified name of the resource in the assembly.
The culture that the resource is specified for.
The JavaScript resource.

Returns a collection of all <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> controls that are defined in a Web page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls.

The collection that is returned includes framework scripts that are sent automatically to the client to support AJAX functionality such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> and <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.

When you use the GetScriptReferences method, be aware of the following guidelines: - Script references with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Assembly%2A> properties are removed as duplicates.
- Script references with the same <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> are not removed as duplicates at design time.
However, they are removed as duplicates at run time.
- The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method is used to return a fully qualified URL for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference.Path%2A> property of script references.
- The script references in the returned collection are cloned versions of the original script references and therefore cannot be modified in designer code by using this collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control that is associated with the Web page.
The collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls associated with the Web page.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> controls.
scriptManager is .

Returns a collection of all <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> controls that are defined in a Web page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control and <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control that is associated with the Web page.
The collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy"></xref> controls that is associated with the Web page.
A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.ServiceReference"></xref> controls.
scriptManager is .
Initializes the specified component.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> component that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
